mapper.select: SELECT id, student, `day`, commit_count, add_line, delete_line,java_file,total_commit,total_add,total_delete FROM studentCommit WHERE student=#{student} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay};
SELECT id, student, `day`, push, issue, comment, create,total FROM studentEvent WHERE student=#{student} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay};
SELECT `${item}` FROM studentEvent WHERE student=#{student} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} order by `day` asc;
